name: 2024 11th International Conference on Bioinformatics Research and Applications
content: Paper Publication: Accepted and registered papers of ICBRA 2024 will be published in International Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1753-6), archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI. Since 2017, the papers of ICBRA have been published in International Conference Proceedings by ACM, archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Special Issue-Impact Factor: 1.9, CiteScore: 5.1 Journal of Integrative Bioinformatics (JIB, ISBN: 1613-4516 ) as a special issue, indexed by EBSCO, CNKI, DOAJ, Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, ESCI (Web of Science), Google Scholar, PubMed, etc.
